<ProgramListing>

<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===- llvm/CodeGen/DFAPacketizer.h - DFA Packetizer for VLIW ---&#42;- C++ -&#42;-===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This class implements a deterministic finite automaton (DFA) based</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// packetizing mechanism for VLIW architectures. It provides APIs to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// determine whether there exists a legal mapping of instructions to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// functional unit assignments in a packet. The DFA is auto-generated from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the target&#39;s Schedule.td file.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A DFA consists of 3 major elements: states, inputs, and transitions. For</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the packetizing mechanism, the input is the set of instruction classes for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a target. The state models all possible combinations of functional unit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// consumption for a given set of instructions in a packet. A transition</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// models the addition of an instruction to a packet. In the DFA constructed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// by this class, if an instruction can be added to a packet, then a valid</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// transition exists from the corresponding state. Invalid transitions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// indicate that the instruction cannot be added to the current packet.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#ifndef LLVM&#95;CODEGEN&#95;DFAPACKETIZER&#95;H</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#define LLVM&#95;CODEGEN&#95;DFAPACKETIZER&#95;H</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return the resources used by the InstIdx&#39;th instruction added to this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// packet. The resources are returned as a bitvector of functional units.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that a bundle may be packed in multiple valid ways. This function</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// returns one arbitary valid packing.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Requires setTrackResources(true) to have been called.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dfapacketizer/#a0afd27b8b7741b32607d3c24dd91eff5">getUsedResources</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InstIdx);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dfapacketizer/#a73ad5c5856a5566e0e80ac2c62cdca7b"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata">InstrItineraryData</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dfapacketizer/#a73ad5c5856a5566e0e80ac2c62cdca7b">getInstrItins</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InstrItins; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// VLIWPacketizerList implements a simple VLIW packetizer using DFA. The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// packetizer works on machine basic blocks. For each instruction I in BB,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the packetizer consults the DFA to see if machine resources are available</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to execute I. If so, the packetizer checks if I depends on any instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in the current packet. If no dependency is found, I is added to current</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// packet and the machine resource is marked as taken. If any dependency is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// found, a target API call is made to prune the dependence.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#a1535a24a0c1b6049bba8cce276f8033f">VLIWPacketizerList</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">protected</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#a12b3d85290b815a7b870ea1b841d4288"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#a12b3d85290b815a7b870ea1b841d4288">MF</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#a4f50fd2b4dcd0bfcb409df2903776f45"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetinstrinfo">TargetInstrInfo</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#a4f50fd2b4dcd0bfcb409df2903776f45">TII</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#a34cd7219145832625cfe1d7b5b873c7d"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aaresults">AAResults</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#a34cd7219145832625cfe1d7b5b873c7d">AA</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The VLIW Scheduler.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#a8bc4ef70bbaad0768409bc9bc56865ea"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/defaultvliwscheduler">DefaultVLIWScheduler</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#a8bc4ef70bbaad0768409bc9bc56865ea">VLIWScheduler</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Vector of instructions assigned to the current packet.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#a6ce4208a9adff0d4c41486339da72880"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::vector&lt;MachineInstr&#42;&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#a6ce4208a9adff0d4c41486339da72880">CurrentPacketMIs</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DFA resource tracker.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#aa563675151ea61dfc14e8dd078327bc9"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dfapacketizer">DFAPacketizer</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#aa563675151ea61dfc14e8dd078327bc9">ResourceTracker</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Map: MI -&gt; SU.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#a73fbb834524be9f7106e907bff83cf06"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::map&lt;MachineInstr&#42;, SUnit&#42;&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#a73fbb834524be9f7106e907bff83cf06">MIToSUnit</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#a2e2e38904990cccef709c985b323566e"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#a2e2e38904990cccef709c985b323566e">VLIWPacketizerList</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#a1535a24a0c1b6049bba8cce276f8033f">VLIWPacketizerList</a> &amp;other) = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">delete</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return the ResourceTracker.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#acacf6d4690a265959ef93817d8230118"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dfapacketizer">DFAPacketizer</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#acacf6d4690a265959ef93817d8230118">getResourceTracker</a>() &#123;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#aa563675151ea61dfc14e8dd078327bc9">ResourceTracker</a>;&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// addToPacket - Add MI to the current packet.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#ae687f7292a0b3db97788f744d37d85d4"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#ae687f7292a0b3db97788f744d37d85d4">addToPacket</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#a6ce4208a9adff0d4c41486339da72880">CurrentPacketMIs</a>.push&#95;back(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#aa563675151ea61dfc14e8dd078327bc9">ResourceTracker</a>-&gt;reserveResources(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// End the current packet and reset the state of the packetizer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Overriding this function allows the target-specific packetizer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to perform custom finalization.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#ac05188b9f403d9279681683e2a7b3d3e">endPacket</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Perform initialization before packetizing an instruction. This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// function is supposed to be overrided by the target dependent packetizer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#ab3369d49af4b9e73ea4946d83113cda5"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#ab3369d49af4b9e73ea4946d83113cda5">initPacketizerState</a>() &#123;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if the given instruction I should be ignored by the packetizer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#ac0e01bf4eca10a5d5f07920f8cf84fab"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#ac0e01bf4eca10a5d5f07920f8cf84fab">ignorePseudoInstruction</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return true if instruction MI can not be packetized with any other</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction, which means that MI itself is a packet.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#a19245ba7597bdc448d2d9f21865e2b64"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#a19245ba7597bdc448d2d9f21865e2b64">isSoloInstruction</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>) &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if the packetizer should try to add the given instruction to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the current packet. One reasons for which it may not be desirable</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to include an instruction in the current packet could be that it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// would cause a stall.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this function returns &quot;false&quot;, the current packet will be ended,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and the instruction will be added to the next packet.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#afa8cb79fea0e885619bcdb347e2bc22c"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#afa8cb79fea0e885619bcdb347e2bc22c">shouldAddToPacket</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>) &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if it is legal to packetize SUI and SUJ together.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#a2ed4f250d154c460d2acd08c81aae5b3"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#a2ed4f250d154c460d2acd08c81aae5b3">isLegalToPacketizeTogether</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;SUI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;SUJ) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if it is legal to prune dependece between SUI and SUJ.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#a9cec2dc6fdf9c6662c833a91db3b7db3"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#a9cec2dc6fdf9c6662c833a91db3b7db3">isLegalToPruneDependencies</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;SUI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;SUJ) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"></CodeLine>
